Treeve White - Predicting Gardes with sklearn¶

This is the documentation for Treeve White’s Predicting Gardes with sklearn package.

Main Package¶

The following documentation is related to the main package.

DataSet.py¶

This moule contains the DataSet class which is used in the predicting grades package.

class predictgrades.DataSet.DataSet(dataLocation: str, numColumns: int, validationSize: int, seed: int, scoringBasis: str = 'accuracy')¶

This class is used to hold the infomation on the data set which is used to train the model used by the predicting grades package.

Models.py¶

This mdule contains the models class which is used by the predicting grades package.

class predictgrades.Models.Models¶

This class is used to handle all the possible models.

These models are taken from the sklearn library and all could be used to analyse the data and create prodictions.

analyseModels(dataset)¶

This metod loop over the models and compares thir accuracy in regard to the given data set to calculae their overall accuracy percentage out of 100.

This infomation can then later be used to determine whih model is the best to use for a specific data set.

Parameters

  • self (Models (object)) – The current Models Object

  • dataset (DataSet (object)) – The dataset which the model accuracy shoud be analysed in relation to.

:return : None :rtype : None

makeModels()¶

This method makes and appends all the models to the modelsList array.

Parameters

self (Models (object)) – The current Models Object

:return : None :rtype : None

PredictGrade.py¶

This module contains the runner code for the predict grade package.

predictgrades.PredictGrades.main(dataLocation: str, numColumns: int, validationSize: int, seed: int) → None¶

This method is the runner for the predict gardes package.

The method initialises all the other neccessary objects and then created a peciction based upon the model selected and the inputted data from the user.

Parameters

  • dataLocation (string) – The path of the database (.csv) file which holds the existing data to be used by the sklearn model.

  • numColumns – The number of columns in the dataset.

  • validationSize (integer) – The validation size of the data set.

  • seed (integer) – The seed of the data set.

:return : None :rtype : None

TextInterface.py¶

This module contains the TextInterface class which is used by the predicting grades package.

class predictgrades.TextInterface.TextInterface¶

This class contains all the text interface methods.

The object controls all interctions with the user via a text based terminal. This form of interface with teh user could be swapped or interchanged with another GUI or similar so long as the same methods are carried out and can be called by the main program of the package.

getPredictionValue() → list¶

This method is used to get th users input data for the students mock grade and attendance.

Parameters

self (TextInterface (object)) – The Text Interfance object

:return : The students mock grade and attendance in a array. :rtype : list

showPrediction(prediction)¶

This method displays the calculated prediction for the grade.

Parameters

  • self (TextInterface (object)) – The Text Interfance object

  • prediction (string) – The predicted grade.

:return : None :rtype : None
